results.content: Nice short course with good explanation

Appropriate explanation about coding. Speed of narration is also ok. And instructor has very good knowledge about technology.
What could have been better - describing \ listing important concepts and explanation about those in 1-2 liner at the end of course.
results.content_html:
Appropriate explanation about coding. Speed of narration is also ok. And instructor has very good knowledge about technology.

results.content: The project was fun to build, however I wish there was more explanation of the thought process of the teacher. A description of why we're doing what would be nice. I was stuck for hours one some bits because for whatever reason my code (even though copied exactly) wouldn't work, and due to the lack of explanation of how the code communicates with each other caused me to not be able to understand why my modals and some other bits of code were not working. All in all though, it was a nice course to take to get a beginners look at the Full stack approach to web development!

results.content: good up to my expectations for beginners its easy to learn

results.content: Instructor tried his best to cover the topics in a shorter time but he missed out explanations for many topics and was super fast in completing this course.
